ygData.subject: Re: When Titans collide
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron first looked at Autofire, Yes Autofire, you are now part of the group of Legends. Ha ha ha he finished, he then looked at Stratus. And you, do you

Subject: Re: When Titans collide
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron first looked at Autofire, "Yes Autofire, you are now part of the
group of Legends. Ha ha ha" he finished, he then looked at Stratus. "And
you, do you wish to serve the Decepticon Empire" he asked.

Megatron looked at Cyclonus, "Then I look forward to you working for me" he
said smiling. He then looked at Triggerhappy and Skullgrin. "The same for
you" he said, then he snarled. "Galvatron wasted all four of your talents,
I could see that through his eyes, but I wont, we will take every
oportunity to crush our enemies" he finished, as his eyes began to glow
red. "Bodicon eh" he said, now adressing the Bodicons, "Then I expect your
loyalty, and look forward to seeing your results on the battle field.
Motormaster" He blurted quickly. "Get Wildrider and yourselves to the
repair bay" he said pointing at Wildrider's corpse. "Decepticons, we have
an empire to retake. Decepticons, FOREVER" He screamed. Motormaster picked
up Wildrider, and took him inside the ship, Megatron addressed his troops
again. "Does anyone here have technilogical skills, to repair my mind?" he
asked.
